reviewText: is what my daughter does!! There are a handful of songs that are liked and known as with most music collection purchases and those select few have made it worth the $
I saw a video in an Indian restaurant of a "cast of thousands" traditional (looking) Indian dances and wanted it for my kids. This isn't it - it's much sexier and the costumes aren't as beautiful.
This compilation is brilliant! I think the choice of songs videos is perfect and i can watch these over and over again!

There are some familiar songs/videos in this compilation, but most of the songs are either unfamiliar or boring. I have another compilation called Dancebusters Vol. 1 which is AWESOME and looking for more like it. This, however, was not what I was looking for.

I was searching for anything with Shahrukh Kahn in it, and found this DVD Collection. There are plenty of his videos, and all the others are great. Good job Sony.

The quality, which is allways an issue with me in this genre, is very good, throughout.
